directions: Arrange tomatoes on platter. Top with onion slices. Drizzle oil and vinegar over. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Let stand at room temperature at least 1 hour. Sprinkle cheese, olives and parsley over salad and serve.
ingredients: 5 ripe large tomatoes, cut into 1/3-inch-thick rounds
1/4 cup Kalamata olives or other brine-cured black olives, pitted
title: Fresh Tomato Salad with Onions, Feta and Olives
